com.bahmanm.utils

Class ListCombinations<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bahmanm.utils.ListCombinations<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of elements of the lists
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<java.util.List<T>>, java.util.Iterator<java.util.List<T>>

    public class ListCombinations<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Iterator<java.util.List<T>>, java.lang.Iterable<java.util.List<T>>
    Lazy (iterator) style combinations of multiple lists.
    It is important to note that the order of the iteration is not guaranteed.
